CustomField.description: If you are exempt from backup withholding and/or FATCA reporting, provide any EPC that may apply to you. For EPC and additional instructions, please refer to the instructions located on IRS Form W-9, which can be found on the IRS website under Forms and Publications.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you are exempt from backup withholding and/or FATCA reporting, provide any EPC that may apply to you. For EPC and additional instructions, please refer to the instructions located on IRS Form W-9 in the IRS website under Forms and Publications.
CustomField.label: Exempt Payee Code
